name: AgileOps
skdetail:

Invocation Name: agile operations
des: The Agile Operations Podcast is a show hosted by Lola.com’s CEO, Mike Volpe. Episodes feature a conversation between Mike and folks who think outside the box as they handle operations at their companies. Mike also features several leaders at Agile Operations companies on the show, creating the platform for the next great conversation in the Agile Revolution.
